about_the_game:
Expand WARNO’s battlefields for free with the Reinforcement Pack #2, introducing a completely new train-inspired battlefield, Railway. Taking its cues from the real-life topography southwest of Hamburg, West Germany, Railway is dominated by its central sprawling marshaling yard. Featuring brand-new railroad assets, the map offers plenty of tactical and strategic choices for both aggressive and defensive-minded WARNO commanders.

Reinforcement Pack #2 is freely available to all owners of WARNO.

Reinforcement Pack #2 is freely available to all owners of WARNO.
legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
name: WARNO - Reinforcement Pack #2 - Railway

short_description: Expand WARNO’s battlefields for free with Reinforcement Pack #2, introducing a completely new train-inspired battlefield, Railway. Based on real-life terrain southwest of Hamburg, West Germany, the map features a host of new assets and plenty of tactical and strategic choices.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
